## Lore Element to Validate

**Element Type:** <!-- Character, Location, Magic System, Timeline, etc. -->

**Element Name:** <!-- e.g., Izack Thorne, Singing Dunes, Collaborative Casting -->

**Affected Files:**
- [ ] `lore/` files
- [ ] `writing_drafts/` files  
- [ ] `game/game.js`
- [ ] `choicescript_game/scenes/` files

## Consistency Check Requirements

### Character Consistency (if applicable)
- [ ] Name spelling consistent across all files
- [ ] Character traits match established lore
- [ ] Relationships align with timeline
- [ ] Dialogue voice matches character personality
- [ ] Age/timeline calculations are accurate

### Magic System Consistency (if applicable)
- [ ] Terminology is used consistently
- [ ] Magical mechanics follow established rules
- [ ] Collaboration vs hierarchical casting is clear
- [ ] Dimensional theory is accurately represented

### Timeline Consistency (if applicable)
- [ ] Events occur in correct chronological order
- [ ] Character ages match timeline
- [ ] Multi-generational relationships are accurate
- [ ] Historical references align with established lore

### Location Consistency (if applicable)
- [ ] Geographic descriptions match across files
- [ ] Location names are spelled consistently
- [ ] Environmental details align with lore
- [ ] Magical properties are consistent

## AI Assistance Plan

**Suggested AI Role:** Lore Curator

**Reference Documents:**
- Master chronicle: `lore/IZACK_MASTER_CHRONICLE_UPDATED.txt`
- Character files in `lore/`
- Geography lore in `lore/`
- Timeline documents in `writing_drafts/`

**Cross-Reference Strategy:**
1. Extract all mentions of the element from each file
2. Compare attributes, descriptions, and details
3. Flag any inconsistencies or contradictions
4. Suggest corrections or clarifications

## Validation Checklist

- [ ] All character names spelled identically
- [ ] No contradictory character traits
- [ ] Timeline events are chronologically sound
- [ ] Magic system rules are followed consistently
- [ ] Location descriptions don't conflict
- [ ] Relationship dynamics make sense
- [ ] Multi-generational connections are valid
